sense.gloss: pickled in (something), preserved in, dipped in
overreliance on (e.g. medication), excessive use of, addiction to, immersion in, intense involvement in
to be soaked in, to be flooded, to be submerged
to be immersed in (joy, memories, alcohol, etc.), to give oneself over to, to bask in
ochazuke, rice with tea poured on it
pickles made in brine and fermented rice bran (esp. vegetables, also meat, fish, eggs, etc.)
to be submerged, to be soaked
to be pickled, to be well seasoned
to be totally immersed (in a condition, e.g. laziness)
chazuke, cooked rice with green tea poured on it

sdata.j: ↑貴殿↑↓きでん↓の↑娘↑↓むすめ↓さんは↑麻薬↑↓まやく↓↑漬↑↓づ↓けです。
↑彼↑↓かれ↓はとにかくコンピューター↑漬↑↓づ↓けだからね。
sdata.e: He eats, breathes and sleeps computers.

sdata.j: ↑塩漬↑↓しおづ↓けキャベツを↑細↑↓こま↓かく↑切↑↓き↓る。
↑来週↑↓らいしゅう↓から↑中間↑↓ちゅうかん↓テストだ。↑一夜漬↑↓いちやづ↓けじゃ、↑太刀打↑↓たちう↓ちできない↑問題↑↓もんだい↓ばかりだぞ。↑今日↑↓きょう↓から↑始↑↓はじ↓めろよ。
sdata.e: Midterm exams start next week. Just cramming the night before won't get you ready. There'll be a lot of tough questions. You should start studying today.

sdata.j: ↑彼女↑↓かのじょ↓のからだは、もう↑腰↑↓こし↓から↑下↑↓した↓、↑水↑↓みず↓に↑漬↑↓つ↓かつてゐました。
sdata.e: Her body was already in the water from the waist down.

sdata.j: ↑彼女↑↓かのじょ↓のからだは、もう↑腰↑↓こし↓から↑下↑↓した↓、↑水↑↓みず↓に↑漬↑↓つ↓かっていました。
sdata.e: Her body was already in the water from the waist down.

sdata.j: マロン・グラアセは↑栗↑↓ぐり↓の↑砂糖↑↓さとう↓漬で、↑日本↑↓にっぽん↓の↑甘納豆↑↓あまなっとう↓に↑当↑↓あた↓るだらう。
sdata.e: A marron glacé is a sugar coated chestnut, similar to the Japanese sweet natto.

sdata.j: ↑別↑↓わか↓れたくないなら、↑私↑↓わたし↓と↑過↑↓す↓ごすか↑仕事↑↓しごと↓↑漬↑↓づ↓けかどっちかにして。
sdata.e: If you want this marriage to work, you need to choose between spending time with me and working all the time.

sdata.j: ↑学生↑↓がくせい↓↑時代↑↓じだい↓のテストはいつも↑一夜漬↑↓いちやづ↓けでした。
sdata.e: I always crammed for my tests overnight when I was a student.

sdata.j: ↑学生↑↓がくせい↓↑時代↑↓じだい↓のテストはいつも↑一夜漬↑↓いちやづ↓けでした。
sdata.e: When I was a college student, I always pulled all-nighters before tests.
